clusters.name: Automated Context-Aware Controls
clusters.summary: Users want intelligent, time-based automation for device settings like sounds, notifications, and display customization that can adapt to different contexts (sleep, work, etc.) without manual intervention.
clusters.action: Develop a scheduling system that allows users to set time-based rules for audio settings, Do Not Disturb modes, and screen customization, with smart overrides for critical notifications like alarms.

demands.description: Enable day/night or time-based settings for custom lock screen sounds with automatic disable during sleep hours
Implement timed/scheduled 'Do Not Disturb' modes that automatically activate and deactivate
Provide full customization options for the welcoming screen interface
Create automated silence overrides for alarms during sleep without requiring manual toggles

synthesized_actions.title: Smart Time-Based Audio Manager
synthesized_actions.proposal: Implement a unified time-based audio control system with 3 core components: (1) Scheduled DND modes with configurable start/end times and weekday/weekend variations, (2) Time-aware lock screen sound profiles that automatically switch between day/night audio themes, and (3) Smart alarm override that bypasses silence settings during user-defined sleep windows (11PM-7AM default, customizable). Include visual timeline editor in settings for sleep hours configuration. Target Q3 2024 release with iOS/Android feature parity.
supporting_demands: Enable day/night or time-based settings for custom lock screen sounds with automatic disable during sleep hours
Implement timed/scheduled 'Do Not Disturb' modes that automatically activate and deactivate
Create automated silence overrides for alarms during sleep without requiring manual toggles

synthesized_actions.title: Customizable Welcome Screen Builder
synthesized_actions.proposal: Build a modular welcome screen customization system allowing users to: (1) Upload custom background images/colors, (2) Modify greeting text and typography from 5 preset font families, (3) Rearrange 6 widget slots for time, weather, calendar, quick actions, etc., and (4) Save/load 3 preset configurations. Include drag-and-drop interface with real-time preview. Ship as premium feature in Q2 2024 with basic customization free for all users.
supporting_demands: Provide full customization options for the welcoming screen interface

nodes.summary: Day/night settings for custom lock screen sounds (e.g., disable during sleep), timed 'Do Not Disturb' modes, full customization of welcoming screen. | Consolidated: Timed/Scheduled Audio & DND Modes: Users want automated silence overrides for alarms/sleep without manual toggles.

clusters.name: Location-Aware Call Privacy
clusters.summary: Users want GPS-based alerts that warn them when they're about to use speakerphone in public or confined spaces where it might disturb others or compromise privacy.
clusters.action: Implement location detection that can identify public spaces (airports, libraries, offices) and trigger automatic prompts when users attempt to enable speakerphone during calls. Consider partnering with venue databases or using machine learning to recognize acoustically confined spaces.

demands.description: Implement GPS-based context awareness to automatically warn users when enabling speakerphone during calls in confined public spaces like airports

synthesized_actions.title: GPS Context-Aware Speakerphone Warnings
synthesized_actions.proposal: Implement location-based speakerphone alerts using device GPS and venue database integration. When users enable speakerphone during active calls, automatically detect confined public spaces (airports, libraries, hospitals, public transit) within 100m radius and display a 3-second dismissible warning: 'You're in a public space - consider using headphones instead.' Build venue database using Google Places API for airports, transit stations, and medical facilities. Include privacy-first implementation with local GPS processing only. Add toggle in Privacy Settings to disable feature. Target Q3 release with initial airport/transit coverage, expand venue types in Q4.
supporting_demands: Implement GPS-based context awareness to automatically warn users when enabling speakerphone during calls in confined public spaces like airports

nodes.summary: GPS-based prompt when turning on speaker during a call to warn if in confined public space (e.g., airport). | Consolidated: Context-Aware Call Etiquette Alerts: Limited overlap; one post suggests GPS-triggered historical info during drives, not calls.

clusters.name: Interface Control Improvements
clusters.summary: Users want more intuitive, customizable, and reliable controls across camera functions, system toggles, and core app interfaces to reduce friction in daily interactions.
clusters.action: Prioritize fixing fundamental UI responsiveness issues in Photos and Control Center, then develop context-aware customization for the Camera Control button and expandable Control Center layouts to give users more granular control over their interface experience.

demands.description: Add built-in camera filters and effects natively to iPhone camera app for social media content creation
Enable tap-to-focus functionality on the Camera Control button for easier subject selection
Make Camera Control button actions customizable based on active app context (volume for calls, zoom/brightness for camera, scrolling for Safari)
Add 4-column layout option for Control Center connectivity controls to accommodate more toggles
Fix Photos app glitches and improve navigation/search functionality
Make Control Center more intuitive and less cluttered
Fix touchscreen lag and responsiveness issues
Improve search bar functionality across iOS

synthesized_actions.title: Enhanced Camera Control Button
synthesized_actions.proposal: Implement context-aware Camera Control button with customizable actions by Q3 2024. Add tap-to-focus functionality specifically for camera app with haptic feedback confirmation. Create Settings panel allowing users to map button actions per app: volume control for calls, zoom/brightness for camera, page scrolling for Safari. Include 3 pressure sensitivity levels (light tap, press, long press) with distinct vibration patterns for each action.
supporting_demands: Enable tap-to-focus functionality on the Camera Control button for easier subject selection
Make Camera Control button actions customizable based on active app context (volume for calls, zoom/brightness for camera, scrolling for Safari)

synthesized_actions.title: Redesigned Control Center Layout
synthesized_actions.proposal: Ship Control Center redesign by iOS 18.2 with 4-column grid layout for connectivity controls (WiFi, Bluetooth, Cellular, AirDrop) and streamlined organization system. Implement drag-and-drop customization allowing users to resize widgets to 1x1, 2x1, or 2x2 grid spaces. Reduce visual clutter by grouping related controls under expandable sections and add 'Essential' vs 'Extended' view modes. Include 200ms maximum response time requirement for all toggle actions.
supporting_demands: Add 4-column layout option for Control Center connectivity controls to accommodate more toggles
Make Control Center more intuitive and less cluttered

synthesized_actions.title: iOS Performance and Navigation Fixes
synthesized_actions.proposal: Deploy comprehensive performance update by Q2 2024 addressing touchscreen responsiveness (target <16ms touch latency), Photos app navigation overhaul with redesigned search using machine learning tags, and universal search bar improvements with predictive text and 50% faster results loading. Implement automated performance monitoring to detect UI lag >100ms and trigger diagnostic reports. Include A/B testing framework for search relevance scoring across Photos, Settings, and Spotlight.
supporting_demands: Fix Photos app glitches and improve navigation/search functionality
Fix touchscreen lag and responsiveness issues
Improve search bar functionality across iOS

nodes.summary: Integrate MacBook-style camera filters directly into iPhone for TikTok hype. | Consolidated: Built-in Camera Effects/Filters: Calls for native filters to boost social media sharing, avoiding third-party apps.
Enable tap-to-focus on Camera Control button for easier subject selection. | Consolidated: Camera Control Enhancements: Tap gestures for focus/zoom to reduce hassle vs. holding/pressing.

Customize Camera Control actions based on active app (e.g., volume for calls, zoom/brightness via pressure/slides, scrolling in Safari). | Consolidated: App-Specific Button Remapping: Dynamic controls for volume, scrolling, or brightness per app context.

Add 4-column layout option for connectivity controls in Control Center to fit more actions, or standalone toggles. | Consolidated: Control Center Layout/Customization: Expandable grids or multi-page fixes for cluttered toggles.

Fix core iOS issues: Photos app glitches, intuitive Control Center, touchscreen lag, search bar functionality (prioritize basics over animations). | Consolidated: Photos App Overhaul: Revert cluttered UI, improve navigation/search (highest redundancy). General UI Bugs: Touch lag, Control Center intuitiveness.

clusters.name: Core Feature Reliability Issues
clusters.summary: Users are reporting multiple fundamental bugs affecting basic phone functionality including WiFi calling, voice recognition for regional accents, keyboard input, and call audio interruptions.
clusters.action: Prioritize fixing basic reliability issues across core features, with particular focus on improving Siri's accent recognition capabilities and resolving disruptive audio/input bugs during calls.

demands.description: Fix WiFi calling functionality bugs and reliability issues
Improve Siri voice recognition for regional accents including Appalachian dialects
Fix keyboard input glitches and typing issues
Replace text notification tones with single beep sound during active phone calls

synthesized_actions.title: WiFi Calling Stability Overhaul
synthesized_actions.proposal: Implement comprehensive WiFi calling reliability improvements including: (1) Add real-time network quality detection with automatic fallback to cellular when WiFi signal drops below -70dBm, (2) Introduce connection retry logic with exponential backoff (max 3 attempts), (3) Create diagnostic logging system to track call drops and handoff failures. Target 95% call completion rate for WiFi calls. Ship diagnostic framework in Q1, core improvements in Q2 2024.
supporting_demands: Fix WiFi calling functionality bugs and reliability issues

synthesized_actions.title: Enhanced Siri Accent Recognition
synthesized_actions.proposal: Expand Siri's speech recognition model to include regional U.S. dialect training data, specifically targeting Appalachian, Southern, and Midwest accent patterns. Add 50+ hours of regional speech samples to training dataset. Implement accent detection algorithm that adjusts phoneme recognition thresholds by geographic region. Include user setting to manually select regional accent preference. Deploy improved model via over-the-air update in Q3 2024 with 25% accuracy improvement target for non-standard dialects.
supporting_demands: Improve Siri voice recognition for regional accents including Appalachian dialects

synthesized_actions.title: Smart Call Notification Management
synthesized_actions.proposal: Develop context-aware notification system that automatically switches text message alert tones to single 200ms beep when active phone call is detected. Include user toggle in Settings > Sounds & Haptics with three options: 'Auto-quiet during calls', 'Always use beep', 'Keep current tones'. Add similar logic for keyboard haptic feedback reduction during calls to minimize audio interference. Implement using CoreTelephony call state monitoring. Ship in iOS 17.4 update targeting Q2 2024.
supporting_demands: Replace text notification tones with single beep sound during active phone calls
Fix keyboard input glitches and typing issues

nodes.summary: Fix WiFi calling bugs, improve Siri for regional accents (e.g., Appalachian), resolve keyboard glitches, replace text tones with single beep during calls, ensure reliability. | Consolidated: Siri/Dictation Fixes: Widespread frustration with accent recognition and voice-to-text errors. Call/Keyboard Bugs: Mute tones during calls and glitchy input.

clusters.name: Advanced Mobile Control
clusters.summary: Users want more granular control over their mobile experience through independent audio management and intelligent, gesture-based access to personalized information.
clusters.action: Develop granular audio channel controls that allow app-specific sound management independent of system settings, and explore gesture-based AI interfaces that provide contextual information access from the home screen.

demands.description: Enable independent audio channels for system and app sounds, allowing app audio to continue playing when phone is muted
Add swipe-up gesture on Home Screen to access personalized updates feed
Implement circle gesture on Home Bar to trigger Apple Intelligence queries

synthesized_actions.title: Dual Audio Channel Control
synthesized_actions.proposal: Implement separate audio channels for system notifications and app media content in iOS 18.4/Android 15 update. Add 'Media Override' toggle in Sound & Haptics settings that allows app audio (music, videos, podcasts) to continue playing when device is in silent/vibrate mode, while system sounds remain muted. Include per-app granular controls in Settings > Sounds > App Audio Controls. Ship Q2 2024 with backwards compatibility for iOS 16+ and Android 12+.
supporting_demands: Enable independent audio channels for system and app sounds, allowing app audio to continue playing when phone is muted

synthesized_actions.title: Enhanced Home Screen Gestures
synthesized_actions.proposal: Add two new gesture shortcuts to iOS Home Screen in 18.3 release: 1) Swipe-up from middle of Home Screen (not dock area) to access personalized 'Intelligence Feed' showing calendar, weather, news, and AI-suggested actions. 2) Circle gesture drawn on Home Bar area triggers Siri/Apple Intelligence voice query without 'Hey Siri' wake word. Include haptic feedback, 500ms gesture timeout, and Settings toggle to disable. Beta test in January 2024, ship March 2024.
supporting_demands: Add swipe-up gesture on Home Screen to access personalized updates feed
Implement circle gesture on Home Bar to trigger Apple Intelligence queries

nodes.summary: Separate system and app audio channels; allow app audio to play when phone is muted. | Consolidated: Audio Channel Separation: Independent app vs. system sounds, especially for muted playback.

'Updates Feed' via swipe-up on Home Screen for personalized info; circle gesture on Home Bar for Apple Intelligence queries. | Consolidated: AI-Driven Home Interactions: Swipe feeds for contextual updates; on-screen circling for instant queries.

clusters.name: Camera Hardware Enhancement
clusters.summary: Users want meaningful camera hardware improvements focused on core optical performance like stabilization, macro capabilities, and flare reduction rather than superficial spec increases.
clusters.action: Prioritize optical quality improvements (IBIS for ultra-wide, better macro focus distance, flare reduction) over marketing-driven specs like megapixel count or AI features that don't improve fundamental image quality.

demands.description: Add image stabilization (IBIS) to ultra-wide camera
Improve macro focus capability on main 1x camera for closer subjects
Reduce lens flare issues in night photography
Add C2PA verification feature for photo authenticity

synthesized_actions.title: Enhanced Camera Hardware Module
synthesized_actions.proposal: Integrate 5-axis IBIS (In-Body Image Stabilization) into ultra-wide camera module and upgrade main camera actuator to enable macro focus down to 2cm distance (vs current 10cm minimum). Requires collaboration with camera sensor vendor for custom IBIS implementation and actuator motor upgrade. Target integration in next hardware revision cycle (18-month timeline). Include calibration algorithms for IBIS effectiveness testing.
supporting_demands: Add image stabilization (IBIS) to ultra-wide camera
Improve macro focus capability on main 1x camera for closer subjects

synthesized_actions.title: Advanced Photography Features
synthesized_actions.proposal: Implement lens flare detection and correction algorithm using AI-based post-processing that activates automatically in night mode. Deploy machine learning model trained on 10,000+ night photography samples to identify and reduce flare artifacts in real-time. Ship via software update in Q3. Additionally, integrate C2PA (Coalition for Content Provenance and Authenticity) metadata signing using device secure enclave for photo verification. Include C2PA certificate in EXIF data with cryptographic signature validation.
supporting_demands: Reduce lens flare issues in night photography
Add C2PA verification feature for photo authenticity

nodes.summary: Hardware camera upgrades: better ultra-wide with IBIS, closer macro focus on 1x, reduced night flares, C2PA verification (avoid megapixels/zoom/AI). | Consolidated: Sensor/Optics Improvements: IBIS, macro focus, flare reduction over gimmicks.
